title: Enlarge - Reduce
content:
Enlarge - Reduce Level 2 Transmutation Spell Make a creature larger or smaller to affect their weapon damage and Strength Checks and Saving Throws. 10 turns 9m CON Save Concentration Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Enlarge - Reduce

Level 2 Transmutation Spell

Make a creature larger or smaller to affect their weapon damage and Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

9m CON Save Concentration

Enlarge - Reduce is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Enlarge - Reduce is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Transmutation school.
